site_name: Ground Floor Flat and Lower Ground Floor Flat, 49 Sydney Street, LONDON, SW3 6PX
description: Retrospective application for previous alterations carried out at number 49 and 49a (lower ground floor) identified under CL/24/01005; as well as proposed new works on the ground floor: Restoration of the original spine wall that separated the front and rear rooms; restoration of the original cornices to the front and rear rooms; relocation of internal front door, which has been brought forward into the flat and is no longer in line with the entrance corridor wall; restoration of the front window to its original height and style, to match neighbouring properties; fitting of additional bathrooms adjacent to the restored spine wall; reinstatement of the original ceiling height in the central section of the property; and reinstatement of the original chimney breast in the front room.
reference_no_of_permission_being_relied_: Changes were identified in a recent Certificate of Lawful Use response letter (CL/24/01005). This application seeks to apply retrospectively for these changes.
